TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Wish Granted, you play something worse

I want the full version of kerbal space program.

Granted. KSP Devlopement was ceased to be updated, and all mods where wiped from existence

I wish to remember to make a wish

Granted. But you already wished, so you have no more wishes.

I wish that Psychology was a little easier.

granted, everyone is killed by AI's which have a very basic logical decision making process. You have a master copy of that process and can identify exactly what they will do given a specific series of stimuli.

I wish I didn't have to do dishes.

Granted, but all dishes vanish and you must use only you lap as a dish.

I wish I was a psychic

You are now a sidekick. The hero gets all the money and attention and you have to wear a stupid-looking bird costume. As a result, you also become psychotic.

I wish I could stay up as late as I wanted.

Granted, but you never sleep again eventually becoming insane.

I wish i could invent functional cybernetics

Granted, but right after you invent them, they explode into a million pieces and you die.

I wish i had a pet Polterpup.

Granted, you are run over by a de-railing train.

I wish for chlorine triflouride.

I wish for chlorine triflouride.

Granted.

You die.

I wish that people would always see from my point of view.

Granted. They all hate your point of view regardless.

I wish I was a little bit taller, I wish I was a baller...

Granted. You are so tall that when you stand up your head is above breathable air limits.

I wish that I could record video with my eyes.

Granted. The government experiments on you, replacing your eyeballs with low-res cameras.

I wish I could be a Time Lord.

Granted. You die and regenerate into a JB lookalike. This is your last regeneration.

I wish that I had a computer that is automatically updated with the newest parts and has unlimited battery.

Granted. I steal it.

I wish for a Sanik.

Granted, you get a Sanik phone battery. It's also dead.

I wish for an incorruptable wish.

Granted. The wish is corrupted.

I wish for an artillery that fires sweets

Granted. The sweets are melted and only go shoot two inches.

I wish I could get into Breaking Bad.

Granted, but no.

I wish people read the rules.

Granted. They read them but have short term memory loss and forget them as soon as they begin posting.

I wish for a dolphin swimming instructor.

Granted, the dolphin is mute, and unable to swim straight due to an amputated fin.

I wish for the beginning of the world to end.

Granted. You'll see it about three billion years ago, or so.

I wish I had a time machine.

Granted. It travels at 1 second per second.

I wish I could wake up earlier than 12:00.

Granted. You fall asleep at 11:59 pm every day, and wake up at 12:01 am. Congratz.

I wish I hadn't suggested vexx32 to go ahead with another riddle of death.

Granted, but it is forbidden to change the past.

I wish people would be a little more careful invoking my riddles.
